articles.title: Only 21 out of 86 characters saw zero representation during Genesis 8's top 128 for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate - EventHubs
articles.description: The Super Smash Bros. Ultimate event that's been going on over the weekend has been absolutely massive in scope. With there being 1,950 competitors registered to participate, this is one of the largest Super Smash Bros. gatherings in ...
